projects.name: Blacky Suplementos
projects.description: Designed and developed a full-stack e-commerce platform for protein supplements using Java 21, Spring Boot, and Spring Security with JWT-based role authentication, ensuring secure access control for admin and customer roles.
projects.stack: Java, Spring, Spring Boot, React, TailwindCss, MySQL, Docker, AWS, CI/CD

projects.name: Tempfish
projects.description: Tempfish - TFS or Temporary File Sharing is a CLI application will help you to quickly share encrypted files and get them immediately via HTTPS with a few commands.

projects.name: Shortener Url
projects.description: This project is a demo to learn how a shortener url works and face some edge cases like how to make sure that every new short url is stored without any conflict, the server will scale horizontally? Do we need a load balancer then. Do we need a cache?...

projects.name: Gonerate
projects.description: Gonerate is a simple cli application that helps you generating the basic code to run a REST application without any external dependencies.
